ygData.subject: Re: XP question
ygData.msgSnippet: there is no penalty, but humans get an xp bonus.  i assume that is *human* and not erudin or barbarian; please correct me if im wrong. belphenor ...
ygData.messageBody:
there is no penalty, but humans get an xp bonus. i assume that is *human*
and not erudin or barbarian; please correct me if im wrong.

belphenor


>From: "Dennis Chan" <dchan17@...>
>
>Do ogre and shaman suffer xp penalty and do human actually get xp bonus??
>
>can anyone confirm
>
